turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two large one topping with pepperoni and ground beef and a side order of garlic breadsticks from Happy Pizza on Oak Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any flavored crust on your pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, what flavors do they offer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have cajun, garlic and ranch flavored crusts.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like Cajun crust on both the pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like the five piece of ten piece order of garlic breadsticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like the five piece order of breadsticks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add a drink to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add a bottle of one liter Pepsi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry but they are out of ground beef topping. Would you like to change your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Then make that two large pepperoni pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add anything else to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have boneless chicken wings?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they do have boneless chicken wings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What flavors of boneless wings do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They honey barbecue, Cajun and Buffalo flavored wings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order the buffalo flavored wings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like the eight piece or the sixteen piece wings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like the eight piece wings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'd like to confirm your order for today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, you may go ahead and confirm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You have two large pepperoni pizas with Cajun crust, one side order of garlic breadsticks, eight piece buffalo flavored boneless wings and one liter bottle of Pepsi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your credit card will be charged for the amount $29.99 before you pick up your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can help you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes at Happy Pizza on Oak Street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you for choosing Happy Pizza. Have a wonderful day!
